root.message: The QUALITY_ASSMNT field for indicator 2-2-2b, translated into all languages

languages.language: Data consistency and quality checks described above are conducted for each potential primary data source (e.g., household survey) before inclusion in the JME country database of primary sources. Country consultations with SDG 2.2 focal points also provide an overall evaluation of the estimates and help to ensure that all recent and relevant country data are included.
